description.fr: Vaincre tous les Bouftous. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Ajoute le sort {Spell:338} à votre main.
description.en: Defeat all the Gobballs. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adds the {Spell:338} spell to your hand.
description.es: Vencer a todos los jalatós. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Añade el hechizo {Spell:338} a tu mano.
description.de: Besiege alle Fresssäcke. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Fügt den Zauber {Spell:338} deiner Hand hinzu.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Papatudos. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adiciona o feitiço {Spell:338} à sua mão.
